Package gw.bc.invoice.entity

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccountInvoice
    AccountInvoice A direct bill invoice for an Account
    AccountInvoicePolicyPeriodSnapshot
    AccountInvoicePolicyPeriodSnapshot A financial snapshot of the policies on an invoice's account, taken at the time the invoice is billed
    BillingPlan
    BillingPlan
    ChargeSlicingModifier
    A ChargeSlicingModifier modifies any of a payment plan's charge slicing settings.
    ChargeSlicingOverrides
    Overrides of a PaymentPlan's charge slicing settings.
    DownPaymentOverride
    DownPaymentOverride A paymentPlanModifier that overrides the down payment percent of the payment plan to be a given percent
    Invoice
    Invoice A container for invoice items for Accounts and Producers.
    InvoiceBilledWorkItem
    InvoiceBilledWorkItem An invoice billed work item
    InvoiceDueWorkItem
    InvoiceDueWorkItem An invoice due work item
    InvoiceItem
    A single entry in the makePayment of payments for a given policy.
    InvoiceLineItem
    InvoiceLineItem The aggregation line item for an invoice
    InvoiceStream
    An InvoiceStream is a stream of invoices for a paying Account or Producer.
    ItemCommission
    ItemCommission Join entity between InvoiceItem and PolicyCommission, for storing Commission denormalized amounts on the item level
    ItemState
    ItemState This delegate represents a set of dynamic state information about an invoice item, including CommissionAmount (which can change when there is a commission override) and PaidCommission (which changes when payments are made against the invoice item)
    MatchPlannedInstallments
    MatchPlannedInstallments Modifies a PaymentPlan by overriding its maximum number of installments, which will be set to equal the number of remaining planned invoice items that have been sliced from a certain associated charge.
    MaximumNumberOfInstallmentsOverride
    MaximumNumberOfInstallmentsOverride A paymentPlanModifier that overrides the number of installments of the payment plan
    PaymentPlan
    PaymentPlan
    PaymentPlanModifier
    A PaymentPlanModifier modifies a provided payment plan.
    ReturnPremiumHandlingScheme
    A scheme for handling return premium
    ReturnPremiumPlan
    ReturnPremiumPlan A ReturnPremiumPlan specifies how to allocate credits through a set of ReturnPremiumHandlingSchemes each uniquely identified by a ReturnPremiumHandlingCondition that identifies whether a scheme applies to a collection of (credit) InvoiceItems.
    SnapshotInvoiceItem
    SnapshotInvoiceItem Captures information about an invoice item at the time an agency bill statement is billed
    StatementBilledWorkItem
    StatementBilledWorkItem A statement billed work item
    StatementDueWorkItem
    StatementDueWorkItem A statement due work item
    StatementInvoice
    StatementInvoice A statement associated with an Agency Bill Producer
    SuppressDownPayment
    SuppressDownPayment A paymentPlanModifier that suppresses the down payment of a payment plan.
    TmpHasBilledAndDueTransaction
    TmpHasBilledAndDueTransaction
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InvoiceItem.HasEventDateOnOrAfterPredicate
    a predicate comparing the event date of the item to a passed in date
    InvoiceItem.HasRolePredicate
    predicate that returns true if there is an item commission for the role and it has a non-zero commission amount
